Posts.Title: To young for breast cancer????

Posts.Content: hi orna  i have just had my lump removed and had my main lymph node taken out and waiting for the results in a few days , i found the lump day b4 mothers day . lol when saw ur commet about nice to meet so many young people !!! that would be how u wud say then wish i cud retract  people around me are just waiting for me to crack up but i dont feel the need , they think i missing the big picture but im not i just feel one step at a time bexjai x
Posts.Title: To young for breast cancer????

Posts.Content: tnx lorna :) i had the same convo with my nurse and she seemed to think i was doing amazing too, i must admit when i booked in for my op and asked for the room nearest the bar it seemed to put the nurses at ease and we had a giggle about it.      it so nice to find somewhere i can talk and be put at ease and fit in and also be honest and not worry about how people react. everytime i see one friend she treats me like i am at the last supper bless her ... xx
